OrgName.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLES EMPOWERMENT PROJECT (CHILYPEP)

Desc.entry: A registered charity that works alongside children and young people aged 8-25 years to find fun and creative ways to be involved in decisions that affect their lives as individuals, as receivers of services and as members of their community and neighbourhood. Organises one off consultation events and long-term participation projects. Participates in strategic planning and policy development working with young people and the organisations that affect them. Runs several projects including Every Child Matters Inclusion Project, projects for children with disabilities, care leavers, refugees and asylum seekers, LGBT and BME young people. Works with local school councils and offers ASDAN accredited training courses for young people including an introduction to youth work and peer mentoring. Self or any referral.
